title: LAST CHANCE! Win a pair of $130 LOOK X-Track Race Carbon Pedals!
content:
We’re giving away THREE sets of LOOK Cycle’s awesome X-Track Race Carbon mountain bike pedals, and all you have to do is answer a few quick questions to be entered to win! Why do you want these? Because they’re lightweight, work great, and have one of the largest platforms of any XC pedal we’ve tested. […]

The post LAST CHANCE! Win a pair of $130 LOOK X-Track Race Carbon Pedals! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
